ygData.subject: Re: The Return of Megatron(tag Predacons)
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron Revived is a cloned and modified body, with a cloned spark, thanks to Vector Sigma.  Airly2002 approved, go ask her. aerosmith4e@comcast.net

Megatron Revived is a cloned and modified body, with a cloned spark, thanks to Vector Sigma.  Airly2002 approved, go ask her.

aerosmith4e@... wrote:*buzzer sounds* cant happen, galvatron which si megatron is part of hydras oops. and the new megatron which is a part of hydras...opps again


> The gunship completed re- entry and now flew towards the Predacon 
> Base.  He knew they would detect him, but it didn't matter.  None of 
> them would stand a ghost of a chance against him.  He slowed and then 
> transformed into his robot mode.  He was now in visible range of the 
> base, and he chuckled his old, evil sounding laugh.  He powered up 
> the fusion cannon on his right arm and felt it would be an 
> appropriate way of indicating his presence.
> "Come out Predacons!  Your Emperor is here!"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Sol'ludnium Prime- Orbiting Flagship of the Seventh Fleet
> >  
> > Through the corridors of of the gigantic battleship Supernova, a 
> large white and black robot walked toward an office door.  The large 
> male hit the door bell and a voice on the other side responded.
> > "Enter Constable."
> > The door slid opened and the officer stepped in.  The large office 
> contained many decorations and awards the Admiral had accumulated.  
> In the center of the room was a large desk, and behind it the Admiral 
> sat.  He was looking at some new business from the government that 
> pretained to the fleet.  He tossed the data pad on the pile already 
> on his desk and looked at the Security officer.
> > "I see your mission to Oricron Core was a success." Hyper Convoy 
> said as he stood and walked to the large window behind him.  "I could 
> not expect less from you, could I, Megatron Revived?"
> > The large Neo Decepticon stepped forward, the stylized purple 
> insignia on his chest fully visable.  
> > "Yes it was.  That prisoner was quite a hand full for the crew.  
> But overall he was apprehended without bloodshed or incident."
> > The Fleet Admiral smiled and turned to Megatron Revived.
> > "You have served our government and it's citizens very well for the 
> past few years.  Our Chief Exectutor, Tyrannis Kaitan, has given you 
> free reign.  You are basically free to do as you choose."
> > Hyper Convoy turned to Megatron Revived.  He extended his right 
> hand, which Megatron Revived hearily shook.
> > "I hear from your old friend Shockwave, that you brothe and sister 
> are still very much alive."
> > "Yes, the Matrix tells me they live and fight even now, but 
> someplace I cannot go," Megaton Revived said, his hand over his chest 
> panels.  Inside his armor exterior, a ornate golden Matrix of 
> Leadership resided.  Vector Sigma gave this Matrix to the Decepticon 
> Liege Maximo.  But Maximo made the mistake of leaving it behind.  Now 
> Megatron possesses it, and eventually even the greatLiege will submit 
> to justice.
> >  
> > ~*~
> >  
> > Weeks later- Restricted Area MGA-0
> >  
> > Weeks of travelling and bartering and threatening, Megatron Revived 
> was mere meters from the jump point were the Maximals and Predacons 
> jumped to the past and started the Beast Wars.  Also, Rodimus Prime 
> pursued Hydras through this point, and now, he had to go through it.  
> In his armored gunship mode, Megatron Revived launched a small 
> transwarp core into the Resticted area.  Undernegth of the ship was 
> an engine pod with the barrel of the fusion cannon powered to life.  
> The transwarp core reached the correct area of spatial instability 
> and Megatron Revived fired his mightuy fusion cannon, detonating the 
> core and opened a rift in space time.  he engines touch off, and the 
> gunship takes off for the rift.
> >  
> > ~*~
> > Prehistoric Earth
> > The rift emptied over the north pole of the little blue planet.  
> The white and black gunship sits motionless, observing and getting 
> his bearings.  Unicron was a far distance off, but too close for 
> comfort.  Megatron began scanning for signs of settlement, and found 
> the closest to be the Predacon base.
> > /Well, let us harass these so called decendants of the 
> Decepticons.  I have wondered about them so, let's see if they live 
> up to there reputation. /
> > The ship changed attitude, and began to enter the atmosphere, 
> headed for the Predacon base, to cause Chaos and wreak havok.
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> >
